content: निपीड् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To harass, pain, molest, injure, punish, trouble; <ls>Ms. 7. 23.</ls> {@--2@} To press together, squeeze. {@--3@} To seize, grasp, hold fast, embrace; गुरोः सदारस्य निपीड्य पादौ <ls>R. 2. 23</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 65.</ls> {@--4@} To impress. {@--5@} To eclipse.
